actionCalls.description: Invoke apex action responsible for User creation from Contact details.
actionCalls.name: COMM_CreateUser
actionCalls.label: Create User

assignments.description: Set Affiliate Account record to create.
assignments.name: COMM_SetAffiliateAccount
assignments.label: Set Affiliate Account

decisions.description: Check if a Case record has an Existing related Affiliate Account.
decisions.name: COMM_IsExistingAffiliateAccountPopulated
decisions.label: Is Existing Affiliate Account populated?

decisions.description: Decision to check if an Affiliate Account was created in process.
decisions.name: Yes_AffiliateAccountCreated
decisions.label: Affiliate Account created?

Flow.description: Screen flow called from Case quick action for Account / Contact / User creation related on Affiliate Registration request.
Flow.interviewLabel: Case Affiliate Registration Request Account / Contact / User creation {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Case Affiliate Registration Request Account / Contact / User creation

recordUpdates.description: Update Case record on process and link it to created Affiliate Account.
recordUpdates.name: COMM_UpdateCaseWithAffiliateAccount
recordUpdates.label: Update Case with Affiliate Account

screens.description: Screen with details for Account and Contact creation for Affiliate Requests on existing Affiliate Account.
screens.name: COMM_AccountContactCreationOnExistingAffiliateScreen
screens.label: Account / Contact creation on existing affiliate Screen

screens.description: Screen with details for Account and Contact creation for Affiliate Requests on not existing Affiliate Account.
screens.name: COMM_AccountContactCreationOnNotExistingAffiliateScreen
screens.label: Account / Contact creation on not existing affiliate Screen

fields.name: COMM_DisplayText_ErrorOutputMessage
fields.fieldText:
Close this window and check the record page. The following Error occurred:﻿

{!COMM_ErrorMessage}

variables.description: Affiliate Account record to create definition.
variables.name: COMM_AffiliateAccount
